data.name: Racoonie: Legend of the Spirits
data.detailed_description:
Small Hero, Great Troubles!

The land of Everland is threatened by an ancient evil! It‚Äôs up to you to embrace your sword and shield and embark on a long, dangerous journey full of puzzles, enemies, and fearsome bosses!

Take on a classical adventure to restore peace and tranquillity in this cute and colorful world.



You Are The Only Tool You Need

Helping the great animal spirits allows our hero to gain new transformations, each of which is associated with new powerful abilities. These allow you to access new areas, solve new puzzles and defeat more enemies!


Explore Everland!

It‚Äôs not all about fighting enemies and solving puzzles. Take your time to explore a magical world populated by a variety of cute characters, with their stories, their quirks, and, maybe, their tasks for you!


The game features:
-Sword and Shield combat ‚öîÔ∏è
-4 Magical Animal Transformations ‚ú®
-5 Mysterious Dungeons to explore üö™
-Tons of Collectible Items üíñ
-Many helpless people with peculiar side-quests üí¨
-A colorful world to explore üó∫Ô∏è
-1 Cute Raccoon to play as ü¶ù

data.short_description: Become the Racoonie! A small, yet courageous adventurer traveling through Everland to collect the blessings of the four great animal spirits.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
